title: Bg. 11.9
sanskrit: सञ्जय उवाचएवमुक्त्वा ततो राजन्महायोगेश्वरो हरि: ।दर्शयामास पार्थाय परमं रूपमैश्वरम् ॥ ९ ॥
transliteration: sañjaya uvācaevam uktvā tato rājanmahā-yogeśvaro hariḥdarśayām āsa pārthāyaparamaṁ rūpam aiśvaram

words_trans.hari\u1e25: the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa

literary_trans: Sañjaya said: O King, having spoken thus, the Supreme Lord of all mystic power, the Personality of Godhead, displayed His universal form to Arjuna.Sañjaya said: O King, having spoken thus, the Supreme Lord of all mystic power, the Personality of Godhead, displayed His universal form to Arjuna.
